addEbomCmdToolTipDescription: Выберите структуру EBOM и добавьте ее в рабочий пакет.
addMbomCmdToolTipDescription: Создайте новую структуру MBOM или выберите существующую и добавьте ее в рабочий пакет.
addPlantCmdToolTipDescription: Выберите завод и добавьте его в рабочий пакет.
addProcessCmdToolTipDescription: Выберите процесс и добавьте его в рабочий пакет.
removeEbomConfirmationMessage: Структура технологического состава изделия "{0}" будет удалена вместе со структурой конструкторского состава изделия.
autoGenerateStructureCmdDescription: Автоматическая генерация структур в соответствии с настроенными пользователем параметрами на основе правил, определенных в Rulestream.
addPlantBOPToWorkPackage: Добавить цеховой технологический маршрут в рабочий пакет
addProductBOPToWprkpage: Add Product BOP to Work Package
setConfiguratorContextMessage: Unless manually set, the configurator context will be pulled from the EBOM or from a BOP structure.
setConfiguratorContextCaption: Set Configurator Context to Work Package
associateConfigContextMessage:
Associate "{0}" with the structures included in the work package and the ones that will be added later?

Note: it will not be associated with the Plant structure.
removeConfigContextMessage: Remove "{0}" from the structures included in the work package?
removeConfigContextWithPPMessage: You asked to remove the Configuration Context. The Production Program is based on it, and therefore will be removed as well. Continue?
removeStructureTitleWithPP: Remove Configurator Context and Production Program
removeProductVariant:
Remove "{0}" from the production program?

Note: to add a product variant that has been removed, you will need to remove all product variants, and re-add the full list of variants from the configurator context.
removeProductVariants:
Remove {0} product variants from the production program?

Note: to add a product variant that has been removed, you will need to remove all product variants, and re-add the full list of variants from the configurator context.
editPPconfirmationMessage:
"{0}" was created, and the variant rules from the configurator context were added to it.
Do you want to edit the production program and set production rates now?
createProductionProgramToolTip: Once you have a configurator context specified, you can create a production program and select the relevant product variants.
